tool_description: Standardizes property prices from various formats into consistent numerical values with currency codes.

raw_prices.description: Array of raw price strings in various formats

remove_outliers.description: Whether to flag potential price outliers

handle_ranges.description: How to handle price ranges (use average if true, minimum if false)

error_messages: Empty price array: Provide at least one price string to standardize.
Invalid currency code: Use standard 3-letter currency codes like USD, EUR, GBP.
Unparseable price format: Some prices contain unrecognizable format or characters.
usage: Provide an array of raw price strings from property listings. The tool will convert them to standardized numerical values.

outlier_flags.description: Boolean array indicating potential outlier prices

parsing_errors.description: Array of prices that could not be parsed
